abstract: Brazilian police say that armed men killed eight members of soccer fan club Pavilhao 9 in Sao Paulo and that they have ruled out attack as fight between rival fan clubs.
lead_paragraph: A detective ruled out a fight between rival fan clubs but did not disclose any other motive for the attack. The police often investigate fan groups for ties to drug traffickers.

headline.main: Attack on Soccer Fan Club Leaves 8 Dead in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Attack on Soccer Fan Club Leaves 8 Dead in Brazil

snippet: A detective ruled out a fight between rival fan clubs but did not disclose any other motive for the attack. The police often investigate fan groups for ties to drug traffickers.
